title: Deep Ravine
description:
This is a deep ravine at a crossing with an east-west crawlway. 
Some stone steps are at the south of the ravine and a steep staircase
descends.

down.failureMessage: The passage is too steep for carrying the coffin.

atmosphere: The air is cool and damp.
Water drips somewhere in the darkness.
Your footsteps echo off the stone walls.
